method_or_measurement: Population size and species richness assessment
sentences: Results showed that biochar additions to the soil had a negative effect on larger-sized soil fauna (earthworms) significantly reducing their population sizes and species richness.
score_explanation: Deducted 1 point for no explicit control/comparison (Rule 1.1) and 1 point for multiple biochar rates without rate-specific effects (Rules 3.1 & 3.2); all other criteria met, yielding a final score of 3.
